title: Maharashtra To Implement AI-Driven Digital Twin For Sustainable Energy, Says Fadnavis
description: Maharashtra is vying to consolidate its power distribution network through a 'Digital Twin' model for solar and other renewable energy sources as MahaVitaran is planning to implement an AI-based digitisation initiative while partnering with leading internatio…
